sid.description: The unique identifier (SID) for the phone number resource.

account_sid.description: The unique identifier for the account this phone number belongs to.

friendly_name.description: A user-friendly name for the phone number.

voice_url.description: The URL to call when a call comes in to the phone number.

voice_method.description: The HTTP method to use for the voice URL.

voice_fallback_url.description: The URL to call if an error occurs while handling incoming voice calls.

voice_fallback_method.description: The HTTP method to use for the voice fallback URL.

voice_caller_id_lookup.description: Indicates whether the phone number performs caller ID lookup on incoming calls.

date_created.description: The date and time when the phone number was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the phone number was last updated.

sms_url.description: The URL to call when a message comes in to the phone number.

sms_method.description: The HTTP method to use for the SMS URL.

sms_fallback_url.description: The URL to call if an error occurs while handling incoming SMS messages.

sms_fallback_method.description: The HTTP method to use for the SMS fallback URL.

address_requirements.description: Requirements for the address associated with the phone number.

capabilities.description: List of capabilities supported by the phone number.

status_callback.description: The URL to send status callbacks to for events related to the phone number.

status_callback_method.description: The HTTP method to use for status callback requests.

api_version.description: The version of the Twilio API being used.

voice_application_sid.description: The SID of the voice application to handle incoming calls.

sms_application_sid.description: The SID of the SMS application to handle incoming messages.

trunk_sid.description: The SID of the Trunk containing this phone number.

emergency_status.description: The emergency status of the phone number.

emergency_address_sid.description: The SID of the emergency address associated with the phone number.

uri.description: The URI of the phone number resource.
